html: Constituents getting calls indicating their Social Security # has been suspended. This is a scam to obtain private info, your SSN is never suspended and SSA does not contact people by phone, only by mail. Below are some websites with additional info: https://blog.ssa.gov/category/fraud-2/ …
text: Constituents getting calls indicating their Social Security #  has been suspended.  This is a scam to obtain private info, your SSN is never suspended and SSA does not contact people by phone, only by mail.  Below are some websites with additional info:  https://blog.ssa.gov/category/fraud-2/ …
